cyclone.name: PHILIPPE
cyclone.current_location: about 525 mi (845 km) east of the northern Leeward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: Drifting slowly west-to-southwest through the weekend and then forecast to turn northward early next week, remaining east of the Leeward Islands and well east of the U.S. Virgin Islands.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: None projected (no direct landfall expected over land during the 5-day forecast)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Eastern and northern Leeward Islands east of 62Â°W; open Atlantic waters east of the Virgin Islands
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are not expected to reach St. Croix; probabilities remain below 5% through the 5-day period.
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional outer-band showers possible late weekend, but widespread heavy rainfall (>4 inches) is unlikely.
